testcase.classname: API_US32 As an administrator (admin), I should be able to update the finding category information registered in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: Verify with GET Method that API_US32_TC01_ValidAuth_SuccessStatus_RecordUpdateValidation
testcase.system-out: * The api user sets "api/getFindingCategoryById" path parameters............passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the 61 information to send to the api FindingCategoryById endpoint..passed * The api user sends a "GET" request body and saves the returned response...passed * The api user verifies that the "details.id" information in the response body is "61"..passed * The api user verifies that the "details.category" information in the response body is "heart problem"..passed
